name: city
objective: We want to make sure we can change the city in the weather widget
description:
UI allow to change the city. 
The weather information for this city is downloaded and displayed.

steps.description: Fill input text field with an existing city and valid
steps.expected: City is found and weather forecast is displayed

name: zipcode

name: bad-city
objective: We want to make sure of the behavior when searching a non-existing city in the weather widget
description:
UI allow to change the city. The weather information for this city is downloaded and displayed.

User is notified in case the city is not found

steps.description: Fill input text field with a none-existing city and valid
steps.expected: City is not found. No weather forecast is displayed.
There is no crash or instability

name: unit
objective: We want to make sure we can change the display unit in the Weather widget
description:
UI allow to change the display unit. The temperature of the associated city is converted from °C to °F and vice-versa.

1° Celsius = 34° Fahrenheit
pre_condition:
- Weather forecast of a valid city is displayed
- Display unit is set to °F

steps.description: Change the display unit from °F to °C and validate
Change the display unit from °C to °F and validate
